description:
From our law office in Atlanta, Georgia, the attorneys at the Heninger, Garrison & Davis, LLC, law firm provide unmatched advocacy and support to those who have suffered injuries or losses caused by others' negligence as well as those who have experienced serious violations of their rights as workers on the job. With additional law offices in Birmingham, Alabama, and New York City, we have grown to become one of the leading legal practices in the following areas:

• Brain and spinal injuries
• Business litigation and intellectual property
• Consumer class actions and mass torts
• Insurance disputes
• Medical device injuries
• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home abuse and neglect
• Personal injury and wrongful death
• Pharmaceutical drug injuries
• Sexual misconduct
• Trucking and motor vehicle accidents
• Whistleblower claims

Established in 2006, our law firm has served the residents and businesses of our community for more than 14 years. During this time, we have achieved remarkable success helping our clients protect their rights and entitlements while securing the successful outcomes they seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

We believe everyone deserves quality, professional legal counsel to fight for justice against insurance companies and corporations that have almost limitless legal resources. We are here to level the playing field for you, and we promise to do all we can to increase your chances for success. Honored for our professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, and many of them are AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell.

To receive a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Heninger, Garrison & Davis, LLC, to set up an appointment. We also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
